body: We are inviting you to answer our customer satisfaction survey because you are a valuable client. In order for us to provide you an even better experience we are collecting feedback on how we performed in our last engagement. We actively use feedback to constantly improve our delivery and provide you with the best possible service. Based on past experience this survey will take 5 minutes to answer and we really appreciate you answer. If you have any questions please contact Ella Schwarz on 070 5555 5555 or at ella.schwarz@cloudstudio.com. Click on the link to answer the survey: https://forms.gle/QKYn3CVmdmMfGCvp9
